chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNode.jsonschema..description:
ChatbotNode represents a chatbot response node with triggers and messages.
 This type is shared between the dashboard (altalune) and inference services.

enabled.description: enabled - whether the node is active

id.description: public_id - unique identifier for the node

messages.description: messages - responses sent when node is triggered (OpenAI format)

triggers.description: triggers - conditions that activate this node

chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNode.jsonschema..title: Chatbot Node

chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNodeMessage.json.description:
ChatbotNodeMessage defines a message in OpenAI-compatible format.
 Messages are sent sequentially when the node is triggered.

content.description: content - the message text to send to the user

role.description: role - message role (currently only "assistant" is supported)

chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNodeMessage.json.title: Chatbot Node Message

chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNodeTrigger.json.description:
ChatbotNodeTrigger defines a trigger condition for activating a node.
 When a user message matches any trigger, the node's messages are sent.

type.description: type - matching algorithm: keyword, contains, regex, equals

value.description: value - the pattern/text to match against user input

chatbot.nodes.v1.ChatbotNodeTrigger.json.title: Chatbot Node Trigger
